name: esqlate
description: The front page of the Esqlate project

scripts.front: cd ./node_modules/esqlate-front && bash -c ' [ ! -d node_modules ] && npm install || true ' && npm run-script build && npm start
scripts.server: cd ./node_modules/esqlate-server && bash -c ' [ ! -d node_modules ] && npm install || true ' && npm run-script build && npm start

author: Matt Forrester
